Module edu.uoc.trip
Package edu.uoc.trip.model.cells

Class RotatableCell

java.lang.Object
edu.uoc.trip.model.cells.Cell
edu.uoc.trip.model.cells.RotatableCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rotatable
public class RotatableCell
extends Cell
implements Rotatable
Class that represents a cell that can be rotated.
Author:
David García-Solórzano

  • Constructor Details

    • RotatableCell

      public RotatableCell​(int row, int column, CellType type)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      row - Row of the coordinate/position in which the cell is in the board.
      column - Column of the coordinate/position in which the cell is in the board.
      type - Relevant data of the cell according to the values of the enum CellType.

  • Method Details

    • isMovable

      public boolean isMovable()
      Returns true if the cell is movable. Otherwise, it returns false.
      By default, any cell is not movable, so this method returns false.
      Overrides:
      isMovable in class Cell
      Returns:
      false.

    • isRotatable

      public boolean isRotatable()
      Returns true.
      Overrides:
      isRotatable in class Cell
      Returns:
      This is a rotatable cell, so it returns true.

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Rotates the cell that invokes this method by using CellType's "next" method.
      Specified by:
      rotate in interface Rotatable
